name: Pin My Balls
description:
This is a simple variation on the classic Windows pinball, but with a twist - the balls keep coming!

Control the paddles with A and D, pull the string with S.

-----------------------

This time I relaxed more than in LD37 and made a tiny, simplistic game, it took about 10 hours. I used Unity with VS, GIMP and Audacity. The sounds are my voice.

Ludum Dare page.
